name: Shadow Over Rigel
description:
A small game made for the E1M1 RGM Jam

Contains:

Hand-Drawn graphics Dithered to hell

An overused gothic horror theme

Knife-wielding madmen

oversized gravestones

and three amazingly terrible weapons

--------------------------------------------------

Main Controls: M - Map

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Use

1 2 3 - Select weapons

MOUSE - Look & shoot

---------------------------------------------------

Keyboard Only Controls: M - Map

Arrow Keys - Movement

1 2 3 - Select Weapons

Ctrl - Shoot

Music by Tanner Helland

https://github.com/tannerhelland/free-music

https://tannerhelland.com/music.html
